cause.description:
We need to help save the Trumpeter Swan from becoming endangered in Canada! Join this group and maybe we can help!
1. Ensuring that future generations get to enjoy this animal as much as we can
2. making sure that the swans habitat isnt ruined!
3. making sure the swan itself doesnt become endangered!
cause.mission: Save the swan from becoming endangered!
cause.name: Save the Trumpeter Swan
